articles.title: Planned Parenthood sues Utah to stop trigger law abortion ban
articles.description: The state's ban took effect Friday after the Supreme Court overturned Roe vs. Wade, prompting Utah's three clinics to cancel more than 50 abortions.
articles.content:
The Planned Parenthood Association of Utah is suing to stop the state's "trigger law" abortion ban that took effect on Friday following the overturning of Roe v. Wade.

articles.title: How the Hyde Amendment is related to the overturn of Roe v. Wade

articles.title: Bill Gates-tied $13M farmland purchase angers North Dakotans
